summary: **Doraemon** is a popular Japanese comic (manga) series about a robotic cat named Doraemon who travels back in time to help a boy named Nobita. Created by Fujiko F. Fujio, it started in 1969 and was later made into a TV show (anime) and many movies. The manga has been translated into English, and the anime was licensed by Disney. Doraemon won many awards and sold over 300 million copies, making it a huge hit worldwide and a symbol of Japanese culture.
title: Doraemon
